alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 8:00AM EST until December 19 at 7:50PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schoharie Creek at Breakabeen. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Water begins to reach riverfront homes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM EST Monday the stage was 6.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 13.7 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schoharie Creek Breakabeen Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Mon 7 am: 6.5 Forecast: Mon 7 am MSG Mon 1 pm 9.7 Mon 7 pm 12.7 Tue 1 am 13.7 Tue 7 am 13.1 Tue 1 pm 11.3 Tue 7 pm 9.1 Wed 1 am 8.0 Wed 7 am 7.2 Wed 1 pm 6.4 Wed 7 pm 5.8 Thu 1 am 5.4 &&
